net.trajano.doxdb.rest

Class DoxResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.doxdb.rest.DoxResource

  • @Path(value="")
 @RequestScoped
public class DoxResource
extends java.lang.Object
    This provides the REST API for DoxDB. The API is built to support AngularJS $resource natively.

        private static final java.lang.String RESPONSE_TYPE

      • getSchema

        @GET
 @Path(value="schema/{segments: .*}")
 @Produces(value="application/json; charset=utf-8")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSchema(@PathParam(value="segments")
                                                                                                                                             java.util.List<javax.ws.rs.core.PathSegment> segments)
        Returns the schema document. It does a check to make sure each path segment contains a restricted set of characters.
        Parameters:
        segments - path segments after the URL
        Returns:
        the schema document.
